showScoreExcerpt: With a cast directed to exaggerate every joke, gesture and facial expression - only the always reliable Roger Bart, who plays the eccentric genius inventor Doc Brown, has the chops and instincts to nail the over-the-topness...With a show like 'Back To The Future: The Musical,' comparisons are, like resistance, futile. And your kids are gonna love it.
bwwExcerpt: Clock tower climax finally and fully justifies its transition from screen to stage
